Presenting at the IISE annual 2022 in Seattle

Jeongwon Park won a 2022 BK travel grant to attend the Institute of Industrial and Systems Engineers (IISE) Annual Conference & EXPO 2022 in Seattle.
His presentation topic was “Order Batching and sequencing in a sequential zone order picking system with consideration of workload balance”.
